<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>comm_channel_def_conference</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="comm_channel_def_conference">notify_group_selectorISNOTEMPTY^notify_group_selectorVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="notify_group_selector" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="notify_group_selector" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate Notify group selector</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var sourceTable = current.comm_task_definition.comm_plan_definition.table; var handlerInstance = new sn_comm_management.CommunicationManagementBridgeSNC().getHandlerInstance(sourceTable); var commTaskClass = handlerInstance.getCommTaskInstanceForTask(); var isValidNotifySelector = new CommunicationManagementUtil().validateNotifyGroupSelector(commTaskClass, current); if (!isValidNotifySelector) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Invalid choice of Notify group selector")); current.setAbortAction(true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-04-08 10:12:33</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>10c3e5ffc7a073000c54885827c2604c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate Notify group selector</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Task Communications Management" source="sn_comm_management">8dfe92d95373030029200ef5d5dc348a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Task Communications Management">8dfe92d95373030029200ef5d5dc348a</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_10c3e5ffc7a073000c54885827c2604c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-04-08 10:30:57</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=10c3e5ffc7a073000c54885827c2604c"/> </record_update>
